body_html:
From #devs:

I suspect it might be something about concurrent runs of 2 backward passes https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L1860-L1861. Can you try putting cuda.synchronize between them and see if the problem persists? I'm still not able to see tolerance failure, only CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED, which still should not happen, so there's a bug somewhere.
